Product.Name: Aldridge suit pant in Italian chino
Product.Description:
As soon as they saw its unparalleled emerized finish, our designers instantly knew they had found the ultimate cotton twill from famed Milanese tailor and textile designer Larusmiani. Working with master craftsmen at the Via Monte Napoleone boutique, we make sure that every bolt of fabric is woven, dyed and finished to our exact specifications to create our finest Italian chino suit yet. This bespoke process makes it harder to ensure color consistency from batch to batch but also gives the fabric an exceptionally soft feel, so we insist. If you have any concerns about color variation in our suiting, please contact us 24/7 at 800 562 0258. Zip fly. Import. Dry clean.
  • Regular trouser fit.
  • Straight through hip and thigh, with a straight leg.

Product.Name: Bucktown shell cordovan all-in-one cardholder
Product.Description: Featuring a slim-line construction that's perfect for pockets, each of these ultra-portable all-in-ones is constructed in genuine shell cordovan leather from one of America's oldest and most renowned tanneries, Horween. Their signature cordovan is made from a specific part of horse hide that, according to the old-world tanning technique, is soaked in vegetable liquors for six months. Each piece is then hand glazed by highly skilled artisans, resulting in a bill holder that's rich in color and craftsmanship. Please keep in mind that natural cordovan ages and darkens over time, resulting in a beautifully burnished look that's truly one of a kind. Made in Spain. 2 3/4"H x 3 3/4"W.

Inspired by vintage workwear, we gave this hoodie old-school accents and a broken-in look and feel. Cotton/poly. Original fit. Rib trim at cuffs, pocket and hem. Long sleeves. Kangaroo pocket. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: 16/20s Heavyweight Tee
Product.Description: After digging deep into athletic archives, we've reissued an original jersey that never should have faded away. It comes from a time when apparel was built to last a lifetime not just a varsity career. And like the original, our 16/20s tee is constructed from heftier yarns that are twisted together to create a thick, substantial feel. This is a tee you'll have forever. Colors are garment-dyed for deep tones and a vintage look. Cotton jersey. Original fit. Crewneck. Rib trim at neck. Short sleeves. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Oxford shirt in Bosley tartan
Product.Description: Our designers have taken the much-loved oxford and updated it in a few of our most spirited tartans. It's here just in time for the onslaught of holiday parties that surely await you; unlike those scratchy Santa sweaters, this shirt is cool enough to be worn out in public. Dense two-ply cotton oxford. Regular fit a tailored cut with a made-to-measure feel. Button-down collar. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Utility fleece hooded henley
Product.Description: Superdurable and hardworking, it's everything you want in a fleece. Inspired by vintage workwear, we gave this hoodie old-school accents like traditional navy buttons, utility pockets and classic anorak detailing. And although it already feels like you've had it forever, it will last you a lifetime. Cotton/poly. Original fit. Hooded. Button placket. Rib trim at cuffs and hem. Long sleeves. Patch pockets. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Marled fleece shawl-collar sweatshirt
Product.Description: A new class of fleece inspired by the texture of Japanese loopwheel fabric an exceptional fleece coveted for its intricate texture, flaws and inconsistencies. We recreated the fabric and gave it our own distinct spin with this exceedingly soft sweatshirt. A bona fide cult classic if we've ever seen one, this piece will be a mainstay in your closet for years. Cotton. Original fit. Shawl collar. Rib trim at cuffs and hem. Long sleeves. Kangaroo pocket. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: 16/20s Heavyweight Henley In Slim Fit
Product.Description: After digging deep into athletic archives, we've reissued an original jersey that never should have faded away. It comes from a time when apparel was built to last a lifetime not just a varsity career. And like the original, our 16/20s henley is constructed from heftier yarns that are twisted together to create a thick, substantial feel. This is a henley you'll have forever. Colors are garment-dyed for deep tones and a vintage look. Cotton jersey. Our slim fit is tailored closer to the body for a clean-lined silhouette. Rib trim at neck and cuffs. Long sleeves. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Heathered utility shirt
Product.Description: Inspired by vintage workwear and crafted in a special heathered yarn for that rustic faded look we love. Cotton. Tailored fit. Point collar. Camp pockets. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Utility fleece hoodie
Product.Description: Superdurable and hardworking, it's everything you want in a fleece. Inspired by vintage workwear, we gave this hoodie old-school accents and a broken-in, had-it-forever look and feel. This one will last you a lifetime. French terry cotton. Original fit. Rib trim at cuffs and hem. Long sleeves. Kangaroo pocket. Fully lined. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: E-Workers/K&TH Manufacturing. Co. workshirt
Product.Description: Meet E-Workers/K&TH, our favorite Japanese import of the moment, known for obsessively authentic reproductions of old-school workwear and near-fanatic attention to detail we think the results speak for themselves. Down to every seam and stitch, this is an exact reproduction of a 1930s traditional workshirt. Featuring ventilation eyelets in the underarms and triple-stitched, reinforced seams with real shell buttons. Cotton. Slim fit a narrower version of our regular fit that's slimmer through the body. We recommend ordering one size up from your usual size. Point collar. Chest pockets. A Collector's Item. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Heathered button-down shirt in Meserve plaid
Product.Description: Our homage to the faded tones and rustic texture of old-school plaids. Crafted in lightweight cotton we've Secret Washed and sanded to feel like you've had it forever. Tailored fit. Button-down collar. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Description: The shirt every guy needs in his arsenal. Made of fine 100s two-ply cotton with a peached finish. Crisply tailored and exceptionally soft, thanks to our Secret Wash. Regular fit a tailored cut with a made-to-measure feel. Button-down collar. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Homespun Knitwear coalminer contrast henley
Product.Description: Vancouver-based Homespun Knitwear, creator of 1930s-inspired workwear, has now made their collection available in the United States exclusively through J.Crew. These slim-fitting Henleys are meant to be worn as undershirts, in the style of hardworking coal miners, iron workers and railroad men. Untouched by bleaching or optical brighteners, each piece has been left unrefined for a unique, authentic look. Made exclusively for J.Crew as appointed stockist in the United States. Slub cotton. Long sleeves. Made in Canada. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Men's Love Save Japan graphic tee
Product.Description: We teamed up with Japanese artist Pesu, based just around the corner from us in New York's East Village, to create this limited-edition tee in support of disaster-relief efforts in Japan. 100 percent of the profits from its sale will be donated to the Japanese Red Cross Society, which provides much-needed medical care and emergency supplies to victims of the recent earthquake and tsunami. Featuring Pesu's minimalist graphic, reading "Love Save Japan" on soft cotton jaspé, this tee not only looks good, it's for an extremely good cause. Enjoy free shipping on this tee. Available for purchase in stores in early June. Crewneck. Rib trim at neck. Short sleeves. Import.

Product.Name: E-Workers/K&TH Manufacturing Co. Lot 20 button-down shirt
Product.Description: Meet E-Workers/K&TH, our favorite Japanese import of the moment, known for obsessively authentic reproductions of old-school workwear and near-fanatic attention to detail we think the results speak for themselves. Based on an old 1920s dress shirt, this features a hidden button closure at the shirt hem; all-cotton, single-needle construction and an overlapped front a hallmark detail of the era. Slim fit a narrower version of our regular fit that's slimmer through the body. We recommend ordering one size up from your usual size. Point collar. Chest pocket. A Collector's Item. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: KATO` / AAA chambray shirt
Product.Description: Hiroshi Kato, the design mind behind Japan-based KATO` / AAA, has made his extremely limited collection of shirts available in the United States just through us. Machine wash. Due to the special dye process involved in creating this shirt, it is prone to color transfer at first. We recommend washing with like colors and wearing with darker items. And because of the nature of this shirt's construction, we recommend ordering one size up from your usual J.Crew size. Import.

Product.Name: Billy Reid at J.Crew Blythewood trouser
Product.Description:
Introducing our much-anticipated capsule collection with CFDA/Vogue Fashion Fund Award winner Billy Reid. The Alabama-based designer regarded for his classic workwear aesthetic recreated the traditional trouser in cool Japanese cotton chambray with suspender buttons at the waist for a nod to old-school style. Says Reid, "I wanted to create something that could look respectable at an old friend's wedding but also get plenty of wear all summer. A workwear-inspired mate to the sportjacket, it works well with bucks or rolled with sandals." Japanese cotton chambray. Zip fly. Elastic back at waist. Buckle back. Cuffed. Partially lined. A Collector's Item. Import. Dry clean.
  • Slimmer, more tailored fit.
  • Straight through hip and thigh, with a narrow leg.

This jacket can be paired with its matching pant as a suit or dressed down with chinos and jeans." Ludlow, our most modern silhouette with a narrow lapel, patch pockets and a slightly shorter cut. Bespoke-inspired details include intricate pickstitching along the collar, lapels, and pockets. Japanese cotton chambray. Three-button closure. Product.Description:
The set piece of our suiting collection, this new double-breasted tuxedo-style blazer epitomizes sharp dressing. Expertly tailored in our trimmer Ludlow silhouette, it's meticulously crafted from four-season world-class wool fabric by Loro Piana. Bespoke-inspired details include intricate pickstitching along the lapels and interior and luxurious Bemberg lining. Ludlow, our most modern silhouette with a narrow lapel, square flaps on the pockets and a slightly shorter cut. Six-button closure. Nonfunctional buttons at cuffs. Double-vented back. Fully lined. Import. Dry clean.
  • Newest fit in suiting.
  • Tailored, modern cut with a trim silhouette.

Product.Name: Saint James® unisex Meridien II nautical tee

With its simple lines and classic design, it's perfect layered or alone. Cotton. Crewneck. Long sleeves. Made in France. Machine wash. Women's sizing: Buy one size down for a more fitted look; your regular size for a looser, slouchy fit.
